item.title: A Big problem m8s
item.dc:creator: @omg_ffs_ownd omg ffs ownd
item.description:
@omg_ffs_ownd wrote:

quotes from YOU:

He was never a mod. But he is great friends with Iki and promises he will never do that again.

Btw, that was JDB` ** oh my god you said btw! it’s supposed to be by the way! learn proper english!**

Ok my friend let me go on his account, and I’m on proxy.

The main reason I want to be unbanned is because I can help the community more, and I like it alot. It really makes me think back to what I did and uhh.

Ikiliki knows what might happen next, because I lended him my account on that site. ** i lended? when was that introduced into the dictionary?

item.title: A Big problem m8s

item.description:
@rondayote wrote:

[quote=“omg ffs ownd, post:6, topic:176219”][quote author=rondayote link=topic=236932.msg2015961#msg2015961 date=1201384075]

wha client are you using…

plz explain more if you want help

honestly…people need to stop replying with that stupid ass comment…ITS TYPING! people make MISTAKES! and all i see that was misspelled was wha and plz, ‘wha’ in a small way short for what, plz short for please. dont be a dickhead

PLEASE use correct grammar/spelling.
[/quote][/quote]

Grammar is a rule dumb ass.
